body.name: DeerValley Elongated One-Piece Toilet, Toilet with Standard Comfortable Chair Height Seat, Dual Flush 0.8/1.28 GPF and Quick Release Toilet Seat, White Toilet for bathroom, 12" Rough-In Toilet
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 39 mins
features: Comfortable Toilets for Bathrooms: Elongated toilet comfort height bowl for luxury and convenience. Toilet has a bowl length of 18.62 inches, which adds to the overall comfort of using the toilet. This feature is especially beneficial for tall adults and the elderly, as it reduces strain when getting up from a seat.

Efficient Dual Flushing: Enlongated toilet features a high-efficiency flush system with two options: a full flush of 1.28 GPF and a half flush of 0.8 GPF, both designed to conserve water. The fully glazed flush system ensures a quiet and powerful flushing performance, effectively no clogging or no leakage.

Easy Cleaning: With designed a skirted trapway and a glazed surface, toilet bowl is not only adds to its sleek appearance but also makes cleaning a breeze. Compared with traditional toilets, it lacks corners and grooves, ensuring easy access for cleaning and maintenance.

Luxurious Modern Design: Soft closing seat makes closing gently and quietly, ensuring a peaceful experience, particularly at night. In addition, toilet bowl is made of durable white ceramic material, It doesn't yellow or crack easily.

What You Can Get: The package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed water fitting, high quality wax ring, floor bolts and installation instruction. DeerValley toilet is covered by a 1-year warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DeerValley Enlongated One-Piece Toilet DeerValley bath always focuses on the development and production of bathroom products. We have superior factories to develop our high-quality products, a perfect after-sales service system and are committed to providing excellent fashionable designs.

Comfortable Seat Height This toilet has the perfect seat height, comfort and convenience for users of all ages and physical abilities. Say goodbye to uncomfortable sitting positions and hello to a comfortable and relaxing experience.

Product Information One of the outstanding features of the toilet is its effortless installation process. With our easy-to-follow instructions and included mounting hardware, you can have your new toilet up and running in no time. No more wasting hours trying to figure out complicated plumbing systems - just install and enjoy!
Technical Details Flushing Technology Siphon Flush System Rough In Size 12" Seat height 16.73" Bowl Height 16" Water Consumption Dual-flush 1.28GPF/0.8GPF Bowl Shape Elongated

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just a great toliet
reviews.reviewText: Never bought a toilet before and was scared to get one of Amazon. But, I’m here to tell you that this is a toilet. It’s the right size, it’s sturdy, has a clean design and just does everything you’d want a toilet to do. If I ever need to buy another toilet, I’ll get this one again 🫡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clean looking toilet
reviews.reviewText: Replaced my very old toilet. This one was well packaged and arrived undamaged. It is very heavy so be prepared. This will be a two person install. All the connections were in the right place and everything went well. The second person laid on the floor and made sure that the flange bolts were lined up this the holes in the toilet base. Once in place securing the toilet was easy and the water line was a snap. One in place it is not moving. I works perfectly and the internals of the toilet were preinstalled you you don't have to mess with that. I am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hard to keep the seat in place!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good but make access to the valve difficult
reviews.reviewText: Very compact, and well made. But compact has it’s toll. Very heavy and access to valves (in our home) very difficult. However, I would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice toilet, but know what tools you need before installing.
reviews.reviewText: Toilet looks great and works great. Glad I chose this brand. But when installing please note to have a deep socket wrench that fits the nuts, because they are on the inside through a 3 inch hole, so you can only turn a wrench about 1/8 of a turn each time. A regular wrench will work but it will take about 20 minutes to secure it to the pipe. Also be sure to connect the hose to the toilet BEFORE you tighten the toilet to the floor, because if you have the toilet secured to the floor, you cannot reach your hand or a pair of players to the hose connection on the back of the toilet., so you will have to remove it from the floor to connect the hose, then go back and tighten it down again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT TOILET IN A DROUGHT SITUATION
reviews.reviewText: My husband replaced our three 23 year old toilets because of the severe drought this year. There is a split flush button on top of the tank, one for solid waste and the other for liquid. Before the pandemic I gave up toilet paper which clogged our old toilets at times and replaced it with white washcloths which I get from Target. I keep about 2 dozen in a plastic box on the top of the tank and a small trashcan for the soiled ones which I wash everyday with the white laundry. They are softer than toilet paper, more absorbent and much more economical. One flush from this toilet saves at least 2 gallons per flush. We are so glad we bought these water saving toilets and would recommend them to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love my product, It was exactly as described and a great product. Price was affordable and the item looks like a high end luxury purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is a very stylish unit. We have not installed it yet as the bathroom is still being remodeled but everybody has something good to say about the looks. It came very nicely packaged and protected to prevent breakage.
